page.title: 13HOBBIES.
page.content: I like collecting Matchbox toy cars. I have over fifty of them. My best cars are Firebird, Lamborghine, Ford Escort, Abrath Racer, Abrath Dunlop, Sierra, Thunderbird, Porsche 191, and a lot more cars. Some of them are convoys. I have got Midnight X-press. Three low loaders and a coal lorry, one transporter and a plane carrier. The plane carrier carries a Harrier. The model Harrier is about 16 cm long and 10 cm wide. My worst cars are a TR7, Lion, a carrier which carries one Lion model, and a parcel carrier. I have a police 'crash up' that is one of my favourites, but it keeps going into a crash. My T.R.7 has got a squashed wheel, and my parcel carrier keeps going off so I do not like it.
